estate_title: Beautiful Single-Family Home in Los Angeles
description: This stunning single-family home located in the heart of Los Angeles offers luxurious living with modern amenities.
facilities: Updated Kitchen with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances
Two bedrooms with ample closet space
Beautiful backyard with patio and mature trees

detail_description.living room: The living room is elegantly designed with ample space for entertainment and relaxation.
detail_description.kitchen: The gourmet kitchen features high-end appliances, granite countertops, and plenty of storage space.
detail_description.swimming pool: Enjoy your own private oasis with a sparkling swimming pool, perfect for hot summer days.
detail_description.bedrooms: Four spacious bedrooms offer comfort and privacy for the whole family.
detail_description.bathrooms: Three modern bathrooms feature sleek fixtures and plenty of natural light.
detail_description.backyard: The landscaped backyard provides a tranquil retreat with lush greenery and a patio area for outdoor dining.

estate_title: Charming Single-Family Home in San Francisco
description: This charming single-family home nestled in the scenic hills of San Francisco offers breathtaking views and serene surroundings.
facilities: Gourmet Kitchen with stainless steel appliances
Two additional bedrooms with ample closet space

detail_description.living room: The living room features a cozy fireplace and large windows, allowing for abundant natural light and stunning views.
detail_description.kitchen: The gourmet kitchen is equipped with top-of-the-line appliances and custom cabinetry, making it a chef's dream.
detail_description.bedrooms: Three spacious bedrooms offer comfort and relaxation, with the master suite boasting a private balcony.
detail_description.bathrooms: Two full bathrooms and a powder room feature elegant fixtures and finishes.
detail_description.home office: A dedicated home office space provides a quiet and productive environment for remote work or study.

estate_title: Luxurious Apartment in Downtown San Francisco
description: Experience luxury living in this stylish apartment located in the vibrant heart of downtown San Francisco.

detail_description.living area: The spacious living area features floor-to-ceiling windows, offering breathtaking views of the city skyline.
detail_description.kitchen: The modern kitchen is equipped with high-end appliances, sleek countertops, and ample storage space.
detail_description.bedrooms: Two luxurious bedrooms provide comfort and privacy, each with its own en-suite bathroom.
detail_description.bathrooms: Two and a half bathrooms boast designer fixtures and finishes, creating a spa-like retreat.
detail_description.private balcony: Enjoy fresh air and stunning city views from your own private balcony.
detail_description.fitness center: Stay active and healthy with access to the on-site fitness center, equipped with state-of-the-art equipment.
detail_description.concierge: Benefit from 24/7 concierge services, providing assistance with reservations, package delivery, and more.

description: This modern apartment offers convenient living in the heart of Silicon Valley, with easy access to tech campuses and amenities.

detail_description.living area: The open-concept living area is perfect for entertaining, with ample space for dining and relaxation.
detail_description.kitchen: The fully equipped kitchen features modern appliances and sleek cabinetry, ideal for preparing meals at home.
detail_description.bedroom: The spacious bedroom offers comfort and tranquility, with large windows allowing for plenty of natural light.
detail_description.bathroom: The stylish bathroom includes a bathtub/shower combo and contemporary fixtures.
detail_description.community pool: Cool off on hot days with access to the community pool, surrounded by lush landscaping.
detail_description.fitness center: Stay active and fit with access to the on-site fitness center, equipped with cardio machines and weights.
detail_description.laundry: Convenience is key with on-site laundry facilities available for residents.

description: Escape to this luxurious seaside villa nestled along the pristine beaches of Malibu, offering unparalleled ocean views and serenity.

detail_description.bedrooms: Four spacious bedrooms provide comfortable accommodations for up to eight guests, each with its own en-suite bathroom.
detail_description.bathrooms: Four and a half bathrooms feature luxurious fixtures and amenities, including soaking tubs and rainfall showers.
detail_description.oceanfront terrace: Enjoy breathtaking views of the Pacific Ocean from the expansive oceanfront terrace, perfect for al fresco dining and relaxation.
detail_description.private beach access: Step directly onto the sandy shores of your own private beach, where you can swim, sunbathe, or enjoy water sports.
detail_description.infinity pool: Take a refreshing dip in the infinity pool overlooking the ocean, surrounded by lush landscaping and lounge chairs.
detail_description.outdoor kitchen: Entertain with ease using the outdoor kitchen, equipped with a barbecue grill, sink, and dining area.
detail_description.home theater: Relax and unwind in the home theater, complete with plush seating and a large screen for movie nights.

description: Experience the beauty of Lake Tahoe from this cozy mountain retreat, offering rustic charm and modern amenities for the perfect getaway.

detail_description.bedrooms: Three comfortable bedrooms provide sleeping arrangements for up to six guests, with cozy linens and mountain-themed decor.
detail_description.bathrooms: Two bathrooms feature stone tile showers and contemporary fixtures, ensuring a comfortable stay.
detail_description.stone fireplace: Gather around the stone fireplace in the spacious living area, perfect for cozy evenings indoors.
detail_description.hot tub: Soothe tired muscles in the private hot tub, located on the deck with stunning views of the surrounding mountains.
detail_description.game room: Entertain guests of all ages in the game room, equipped with a pool table, foosball table, and board games.
detail_description.deck with lake views: Relax on the deck with panoramic views of Lake Tahoe, where you can enjoy meals or simply soak in the natural beauty.
detail_description.ski storage: Store your ski equipment securely in the dedicated ski storage area, making it easy to hit the slopes.
